explanation: [0-0] In front of a purple background with blue stars, there are three giant blue test tubes. The tube in the middle features a cartoon drawing of a smiling blue firetruck and a smiling red ambulance. The tube on the right has a drawing of a smiling red helicopter and a smiling blue police car. The tube on the left has no drawings on it.

[0-2] Next, the cartoon drawings on the tubes fall into the tubes. The tube on the left remains empty. In the middle tube, a smiling blue tow truck falls in. In the right tube, a smiling red firetruck with a ladder falls in. A blue clock and progress bar appear at the top of the screen, indicating the remaining time in the game.

[0-2] Next, the cartoon drawings on the tubes fall into the tubes. The tube on the left remains empty. In the middle tube, a smiling blue tow truck falls in. In the right tube, a smiling red firetruck with a ladder falls in. A blue clock and progress bar appear at the top of the screen, indicating the remaining time in the game.

[2-9] The blue progress bar at the top of the screen gradually shortens. The blue tow truck at the top of the middle tube is moved to the left tube. Then, the red ambulance, the second one in the middle tube, is also moved to the left tube. Next, the red firetruck at the top of the right tube is moved on top of the red ambulance in the left tube. Then, the blue police car in the right tube is moved on top of the blue firetruck in the middle tube.

[9-16] By now, half of the progress bar has disappeared and turned white. The remaining blue part of the progress bar starts flashing red, indicating time is running out. The cartoon drawings in the test tubes frown, and a blue water droplet appears above their eyebrows. Then, the red firetruck and the red ambulance are moved from the left tube to the right tube. Finally, with very little time remaining, the last blue tow truck in the left tube is put into the middle tube. As it's placed, colorful confetti and ribbons appear in the center of the screen, indicating the game has been successfully completed. The focus shifts to the tube containing the red and blue cartoon drawings.
